ygData.messageBody:
> I agree. I like the "eye candy" as well. It makes the game for me.

Same here. I enjoy the animations and sounds of spellcasting, because they are mysterious-looking and interesting. I still frequently flip to another camera angle to see myself cast the spells.
What is also very cool-looking is casting Firebolts from a high place. You can actually see the bolt fly and curve down and slam into the victim. I always do this, also because the high position is safer (avoid melee combat).
Anyway, I second the motion for more spell animations.

Aznyin
Level 15 Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Location: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
